## ErrorResponse.refresh property

The value assigned to `this.refresh` during script evaluation.

This property is omitted unless the error occurred during script evaluation and may be omitted unless the script assigned `this.refresh`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
refresh?: ScriptValue;
```
